title: Report: Lockdown in Chinese city won’t have a big impact on iPhone production
content:
After a rise in COVID-19 cases in Shenzhen, considered China’s Silicon Valley, the city is currently in lockdown. Due to that, Foxconn had suspended its operations in Shenzhen until further notice, but according to a report, it won’t impact iPhone production much.

more…

The post Report: Lockdown in Chinese city won’t have a big impact on iPhone production appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Foxconn had suspended its operations in Shenzhen until further notice, but according to a report, it won't impact iPhone production much.
